content: Alyssa Haroldsen [she] has marked this topic as resolved.

IIRC There was a whole discussion on unsafe-code-guideline like a year ago about metadat validity of null pointers.
I'll try to look for it on zulip or github (hard from the phone)

Found it!
https://github.com/rust-lang/unsafe-code-guidelines/issues/166#issuecomment-552802163
"Me: how do I create null wide pointers? Ralf: you can't."
Yes, though later in the thread it's '"raw pointers do not have a safety invariant" seems like a reasonable assumption people would make.'
